definition: loess (yellow sandy soil typical of north China)
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
face to the ground, back to the sky
pinyin: mian4 chao2 huang2 tu3 bei4 chao2 tian1

definition: a slogan used in reference to a project to improve greenery in some parts of Northern China

sentences.english: Loess is widely distributed in China, and it mainly lies in the central and western regions.
sentences.chinese: 黃土在我國分佈廣泛，而且主要分佈在中西部地區。

sentences.english: The Folk Songs of Northern Shaanxi is the most representative artistic form ofthe Loess Culture.
sentences.chinese: 陝北民歌是黃土文化中最具代表性的藝術形式。

sentences.english: O, boy! Is Last night's wine of Loess Plateau sweet?
sentences.chinese: 男孩啊，黃土高坡昨夜的酒，可好。

sentences.english: Loess landslide is the most catastrophic geohazard in the northwest area of China.
sentences.chinese: 黃土滑坡是西北地區最爲嚴重的地質災害。

sentences.english: The behavior of good soil field holding capacity on the tableland area is the superior advantage of ecological conditions for this region.
sentences.chinese: 臺原土壤優良持水特性是黃土旱源優勢的生態條件。

sentences.english: Slope orchard in arid area is the main forestry manage model on Loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 坡地旱作果園是我國黃土區坡面主要農林業經營形式。

sentences.english: Xi'an city wall is an artificial loess slope composed of inner-soil and outer-brick masonry.
sentences.chinese: 西安明城牆是由內芯土和外包牆組成的人工黃土邊坡。

sentences.english: For your purple soul in Acheron.
sentences.chinese: 呈給你黃土下紫色的靈魂。

sentences.english: Dry year is relatively common in loess region, particularly spring drought.
sentences.chinese: 黃土丘陵區幹早年份較常見，春旱尤爲嚴重。

sentences.english: An investigation of foraminifera was conducted in the last glacial loess along the coast of the Bohai Sea.
sentences.chinese: 通過對渤海沿岸末次冰期黃土中有孔蟲化石的研究。

sentences.english: The unsaturated irrigation supply has duality in yellow soil.
sentences.chinese: 集中的灌溉補給，在黃土層中形成二元非飽和滲流。

sentences.english: Can the Yellow Land leverage its power to open up new opportunities?
sentences.chinese: 黃土地能不能善加利用它的力量創造新機遇？

sentences.english: Unless the loess bones of me and keep you the centenary worryfree.
sentences.chinese: 縑罤除非黃土白骨，我守你百歲無憂。

sentences.english: It's proved that High-density Resistivity Electricity Method is very suitable for polluted sites.
sentences.chinese: 證實了電阻率法可檢測黃土的污染範圍及程度。

sentences.english: The warming and drying of the climate in the plateau resulted in the decending of climate-productivity.
sentences.chinese: 黃土高原氣候暖幹化使作物氣候生產力下降。

sentences.english: For most of China’s history, the Yellow Land has been the center of political power.
sentences.chinese: 在中國歷史上，黃土地大多數時候是政治權力中心。

definition: left to return to unchecked growth/overgrown/grown wild
homeless and miserable/forced to leave home and wander from place to place/to live as a refugee
